title: A whole-of-population study of the prevalence and patterns of criminal offending in people with schizophrenia and other mental illness – ERRATUM
abstract: The publisher apologizes for errors introduced into the key of Figure 2 in this article (Morgan et al. 2012). The lines for ‘Schizophrenia’ and ‘No psychiatric illness’ were accidentally transposed. The correct Figure 2 is given below. © 2013, Cambridge University Press. All rights reserved.
